name: Garden Tale
description: Garden Tale is a 2.5D simulation RPG with a focus on strategy. Use the Bonion, cute but explosive plants to make a chain reaction to win!
minimum_requirements: 最低配備: 作業系統: Windows 7 / 8 處理器: Intel Core i5 / i7 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體 顯示卡: DirectX 9.0c Shader 3.0 (GPU made by NVIDIA recommended) 儲存空間: 420 MB 可用空間
